title: Really Good Film
review:
Loves Knows No Boundaries. I like the girl not only because she is a hottie (those legs and hair wow!), but also because she has a mind of her own and does her own thing. She is not letting society, best friend, convention, mother, rules, co-workers tell her who, she can love and whom she cannot love and what can do and what she cannot do.
By the way, the man(ager) resisted that????

title: Not Just An Athletics Film
review: This film could be recommended to several groups. Track and field fans, teen movie fans, eye candy fans and of course people who want to break barriers and be free to choose. Yeah freedom fans. The three main girls are really pretty but I think sadly only one had long hair.

title: Short haired girl ugly - long haired girl pretty
review:
Of course!

With that said, overall a good message and both girls have nice legs. Even the third one is slim and attractive.
